attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir
I have deferred my pension and whilst I continue to receieve my winter fuel allowance I apparently do not qualify for the £10 Christmas Bonus or the extra one off payment of £60.00  This is somewhat inconsistent and unfair don't you think?

Your faithfully

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
